title: feColorMatrix
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The feColorMatrix SVG filter primitive allows a color matrix to be applied to the input image.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.code:
<svg>
  <filter id="greyscale">
    <feColorMatrix type="saturate" values="0"/>
  </filter>
  <image x="0" y="0" width="100" height="100" xlink:href="image.jpg" filter="url(#greyscale)"/>
</svg>

usageExamples.title: Example 2
usageExamples.code:
<svg>
  <filter id="huerotate">
    <feColorMatrix type="hueRotate" values="90"/>
  </filter>
  <image x="0" y="0" width="100" height="100" xlink:href="image.jpg" filter="url(#huerotate)"/>
</svg>
